import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import { CustomHook } from "../hooks/CustomHook"; import { log, success, error } from "../utils/logs"; import { LockClosedIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; const Login = () => { const history = useHistory(); const email = CustomHook("email"); const password = CustomHook("password"); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); log("login attempt..."); const { data } = axios.post("/api/auth/login", { email: email.value, password: password.value, }); history.push("/home"); }; return (
